text: @WhiteHouse Um.... @realDonaldTrump  hate to break it to you but America is LARGER than many nations on earth.  You have to look at per-capita numbers!  Do you know what "per-capita" means?  We're like 9th, behind Canada and Belgium....  Get your FACTS straight https://t.co/2qUqVlC4Jj
